name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tellus Rental Management Tools - Work Orders

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tellus is the only landlord software you need to manage your rental properties. Create work orders from Appfolio, Cozy, and Yardi.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the future of real estate investing. Tellus empowers investors to maximize returns and build a robust portfolio in major markets. Track your investments with dynamic tools and ditch the clutter of archaic software. 

Manage your rental property with professional tools, unlock your home equity this week, and browse through high-yield real estate investment opportunities—all from your phone! 

——
REAL ESTATE INVESTING

Tellus Investments is changing the way investors approach real estate. Invest in fractions of properties with little capital. Diversify your portfolio and earn daily returns!

■ Invest in the best residential properties on the market
- Fractional ownership diversifies your portfolio

■ Own a piece of an actual home!
- Not just derivatives; get your name recorded on the home title!
- Your investments are backed by real property as collateral

■ Earn DAILY returns!
- Invest in the property of your choice and make money each day
- Get higher interest rates than any bank

■ Diversify your passive income streams
- Strengthen your portfolio by investing in multiple properties
- Fractional ownership means a little capital goes a long way!

■ Enjoy ultimate flexibility to buy and sell at any time
- No iron-clad contracts or timelines
- Get easy access to your money when you need it

Learn more: tellusapp.com/invest

——
HOME EQUITY LOANS

Do you own a home? Tellus lets homeowners apply for a home equity loan regardless of credit score!

■ No credit check required
- No more feeling trapped by your credit score
- Low interest rates
- Loan is based on the value of your property

■ Turn home equity into cash
- Access your money like you would from a bank account
- Take advantage of your most valuable asset

■ Response within 24 hours
- Simple, digital application

■ Turn your most valuable property into a liquid asset
- Get fast cash for important life events
- Closing time takes days, not weeks

Learn more: tellusapp.com/borrow

——
RENTAL PROPERTY MANAGEMENT

Put your rental properties on cruise control! Landlords, property managers, and renters save time and love how Tellus keeps everything in one place.

■ Collect rent securely online
- Fast, FREE bank transfers with AutoPay
- Pay rent with a credit card (3.4% surcharge)
- Be notified of payments, late rent, and status updates

■ Find qualified renters with free tenant screening
- Collect digital applications; compare applicants
- Credit reports, rental history, eviction history, and more

■ List your properties on the top rental websites, including Zillow!
- Personalized listing consultants increase traffic for your listing

■ Communicate with tenants and other contacts over real-time chat
- Communication is instant—no more phone tag
- Cut down on messages and phone calls

■ Keep an eye on your property’s status and track financial performance
- Create professional reports your CPA will love
- All reports, ledgers, and records update automatically with each new entry
- Cut down on the paperwork with a digital filing cabinet. Never lose a receipt again!

■ Streamline service and maintenance requests with automated tickets
- Get notified instantly of any issues
- Find qualified repair professionals

Learn more: tellusapp.com/manage

——
WHY TELLUS?

Tellus offers unprecedented real estate management from your smartphone. Keep close tabs on your property, view your investments in real time, or fill out a digital home loan application with just a few taps. Using Tellus is like having a dozen personal assistants working to make your life easier! There has never been a real estate management platform as comprehensive as this.

Download it today and join the property revolution!

Website: tellusapp.com
Twitter: @tellushome
Facebook: @tellusapp
Instagram: @tellusapp
Blog: blog.tellusapp.com


___________________________________________________________

Tenant maintenance issues can overwhelm landlords and property managers who don’t have the right tools to deal with them. Experience a streamlined process for work orders through Tellus, a fintech app built for real estate. Tenants can message their landlord or property manager directly through chat about an issue, add photos and notes, and mark problems as urgent for emergencies.
 
It’s easy for landlords and property managers to respond to tenant repair requests and service tickets from their mobile phone or web browser. Tellus will even help find contractors in your area to help with the job. Best of all, record keeping is automatic. Say goodbye to digging through old emails or entering things into Excel.
 
Users can manage work orders directly from the app or through this Chrome extension.
 
1) To get started, visit tellusapp.com to set up an account.
2) Highlight any work order description, select the extension (top right), and log into your Tellus account.
3) The description shows up automatically.
4) Select the property for which you want to create a work order and submit it. Your work order is created!
